attributes.action: introduce a 50% top rate tax for income above £150,000 p.a.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop penalising those on low incomes and start taxing those that can actually afford it. By introducing a top rate tax of 50% for the wealthy, the annual personal allowance can be raised in place of the 10% tax band (i.e. £7,455 for the year 07/08).
